abstract: Firefighters are pushed to physical and mental extremes by unprecedented scope of recent forest fires caused by extended droughts and rising temperatures; soldiers and civilians are pitching in to fight blazes that have claimed thousands of homes in California and nine million acres of land across United States this year.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of firefighters have worked around the clock, battling exhaustion, to try to contain flames that have swept through vast acreage.

headline.main: In Vicious Fire Season, an Endurance Test for California Crews
headline.print_headline: Punishing Fire Season in California Exacts Price on Crews: Exhaustion

snippet: Thousands of firefighters have worked around the clock, battling exhaustion, to try to contain flames that have swept through vast acreage.
